item.title: Thomas Tiveron
item.author: thomas@tiveron.ca (Thomas Tiveron)
item.description:
Your learning, just got easier!

Come along on my journey from civil engineer to software entrepreneur.

You can follow along my learning progress, and join in too! Don’t hesitate to contact me if you need help or believe that I have the skills you need. Below are some recent posts of mine on a range of topics, from business to course reviews to website building.

Thanks for reading
